:orphan:

Basic use cases
===============

Build, segment, resample an OSmOSE dataset, and analyze its metadata
-------------------------------------------------------------------------





.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This code will show you how to format your raw audio data into a OSmOSE dataset, in the case of...">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery_basic_use_cases/Dataset/images/thumb/sphx_glr_1_build_dataset_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_basic_use_cases_Dataset_1_build_dataset.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">First time building a OSmOSE dataset</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This code will show you how to build a OSmOSE dataset in case of a mobile hydrophone.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /gallery_basic_use_cases/Dataset/images/thumb/sphx_glr_2_mobile_hydrophone_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_basic_use_cases_Dataset_2_mobile_hydrophone.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">In case of a mobile hydrophone</div>
    </div>

Generate spectrograms
---------------------------------

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">

  :ref:`sphx_glr_gallery_basic_use_cases_Spectrogram_1_generate_spectrogram.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Generation with default parameters</div>
    </div>

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This code will show you how to tune more spectrogram parameters">

Spatiotemporal join between acoustics and auxiliary data
--------------------------------------------------------------






.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Join with csv files and ERA5 data</div>
